review: As a case manager, I need to keep up with documentation on a daily basis.  This desk does the job; it holds a fairly heavy Dell Tablet; doesn't move at all while I type.  I do have to slide my seat back, but I'm okay with that.  My co-workers type sideways but that's so uncomfortable.  Yes, I would recommend this desk; for the price it works very well and I'm satisfied.
productTitle: Zone Tech Multi-Functional Portable Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray - Gray Table/Car Vehicle Seat Portable Mount Tray Laptop Notebook Table Eating Desk
